left.label: Resources
left.heading: How to get involved and key links
left.description: Join Filecoin Slack and participate in our bi-weekly community governance calls every other Tuesday

cards.title: Filecoin's Documentation
cards.description: Filecoin project documentation homepage offers the tools to contribute to the network.

cards.title: Filecoin GitHub
cards.description: Contribute to Filecoin and help improve it by engaging in the Filecoin GitHub repository.

cards.title: Filecoin 2020 Mainnet Ignition & Liftoff
cards.description: This covers the timeline of the Filecoin Mainnet Ignition & Liftoff.

cards.title: Filecoin Network Status
cards.description: This dashboard provides the latest update of the Filecoin Network.

cards.title: Filecoin 2021 Orbit
cards.description: Mark the one-year anniversary since Filecoin Mainnet launch with ecosystem events and celebrations around the world.

cards.title: Filecoin Forums
cards.description: A public forum for the Filecoin protocol, implementation, community, and more.

cards.title: Filecoin Research
cards.description: Breakthroughs underpinning the Filecoin protocol, as well as future areas of exploration.

cards.title: Cryptoeconomics Overview
cards.description: This report describes the components of the Filecoin economy and how they interact.

cards.title: Filecoin Tutorials (ProtoSchool)
cards.description: This is a self-guided interactive Filecoin tutorial designed to introduce decentralized web concepts, protocols, and tools.
